name: Everyday Saver Plan - Hybrid 3 Profiles with Ads - No Cloud DVR, Single Household
description: A copper-tier streaming plan designed for households that need 3 profiles and 2 concurrent streams. Uses a flexible hybrid pricing model at about $27.00 per month, billed in USD. Includes some ad-supported content to keep the base price low.

name: Palladium VIP Plan - Per-Channel 7 Profiles No Ads - Full Cloud DVR, Multihome Extension
description: A palladium-tier streaming plan designed for households that need 7 profiles and 4 concurrent streams. Uses per-channel pricing for ultimate control at about $170.00 per month, billed in USD. Provides an ad-free viewing experience across included content. Includes cloud DVR for recording live events and shows. Supports offline downloads on supported devices. Can be shared across multiple households, subject to terms.

name: Top Tier Unlimited Plan - Per-Bundle 6 Profiles No Ads - Full Cloud DVR, Multihome Extension
description: A platinum-tier streaming plan designed for households that need 6 profiles and 4 concurrent streams. Uses per-bundle pricing for add-on content at about $131.00 per month, billed in USD. Provides an ad-free viewing experience across included content. Includes cloud DVR for recording live events and shows. Supports offline downloads on supported devices. Can be shared across multiple households, subject to terms.

name: Family Basics Plan - Flat Rate 3 Profiles with Ads - No Cloud DVR, Multihome Extension
description: A bronze-tier streaming plan designed for households that need 3 profiles and 2 concurrent streams. Uses a simple flat monthly rate at about $38.00 per month, billed in USD. Includes some ad-supported content to keep the base price low. Can be shared across multiple households, subject to terms.

name: Family Basics Plan - Flat Rate 4 Profiles No Ads - No Cloud DVR, Single Household
